DOC.brief_summary: This study is an evaluation of the safety of 625 mg formulation when administered to HIV-infected pregnant women from their second trimester through six weeks postpartum. The study will also evaluate the pharmacokinetics of VIRACEPT
DOC.brief_title: Safety Of VIRACEPTÂ® 625mg Administered To HIV-Infected Women During Pregnancy
DOC.criteria: HIV infection Second trimester of pregnancy Major current or prior history of obstetrical complications Serious current medical diseases Evidence of HIV virus resistance to antiretroviral agents
DOC.keyword: Non-randomized open-label single-arm study of Nelfinavir plus Combivir in pregnant females infected with HIV-1 virus.
